Any tips on starting the process of creating? As i feel that my work may not be good in practise as I am a beginner.. 

      that's normal. but if you can get excited about being terrible, then you will be excited all along the way until you improve. then eventually you'll have to learn to be excited about being really good. hopefully you will be able to make that adjustment when the time comes

      that's fair

      n

     I was a percussionist all throughout highschool but all I learned was the music staff

      well, put it this way, it's bigger than your house, and your neighbor's house and all your neighbors' neighbors' houses, combined

this is Mr. President Joe Biden.

     it's easy

     i think you just change it

2.24.24  5:20 pm   how many words?

      3

2.24.24  4:42 pm   ive always thought that the major and minor intervals come from the major and minor scales. but apparently they don't, and its the other way around. how does this work?

      i guess it's just like what other notes are you likely to want, when a major or minor chord is being played. but of course that's never really an exact perscription for what you really want. often you'll need more, less, or even something else

2.24.24  4:19 pm   What should I do with my left hand when playing piano?

     what is your right hand doing, what is your voice doing, and what are the hands instruments and voices of the rest of the people in the band doing

     I usually just play chords with it but I never really see people doing the same so it must be wrong, any tips?

     there are many different roles a piano player may find themselves in.
     1. you may be alone, singing a song and accompanying yourself with the piano. in that case, it's likely that your left hand will take the bass, and your right hand will take the chords, and your voice will take the melody.
     2. you may be alone on the piano without singing. in this case you will probably be finding a way to generally cover bass, harmony, and melody, in various combinations of ways with whatever hands you can.
     3. you may be in a small band with only bass and drums and piano. in that case, you will probably be responsible for melody and chords, in which case you will probably find your right hand doing a lot of melody (and some harmony) and your left hand lending some harmonic support where possible, and staying the heck out of the bass.
     4. you may be in a band which includes a bass player and another melody player (or singer). in this case, again you'll want to stay the heck out of the bass, you won't need to be the main melody leader, and your main job will probably be just harmonic support. and in this situation, you'll probably want to be very careful about 2-handed playing, because most of what you need to do will probably be in a very one-handed range. if you insist on being very 2-handed here, you will probably be crowding the ensemble here
     5. you may be in a band which includes a bass player, another melody player, AND also other harmonic players such as guitar. this case is similar to the above case, but even more delicate, and it's going to require some direct communication with the guitar player, to coordinate who does what. there's a lot of ways the 2 of you could ruin each other's lives, but as long as you are in communication then you can build exactly what you need, together
     all of the above situations are completely different roles for a piano player. this makes sense, because the piano actually contains the entire range of musical notes. so depending on who else is in the ensemble, you could be doing as much as everything or as little as nothing

2.24.24  2:03 pm   Will you ever do ventriloquism in a video?

      it's possible, but nowadays it may be better suited to a real-life situation

2.24.24  1:41 pm   does the word "be" get to be part of the land of the two letter words

      i don't see why not

2.24.24  1:26 pm   Okay, so I've been cooking this 8 bar cadence (or sumthing), but I cannot figure a good resolution.
C / Cmaj7 / Edim / Bbmaj7
Eb / Bb / ?? ?? / C
But I cannot decide how to bring this home. Would you preferer:
A) Bb / F / G7 / C
B) Bb / G / G7 / C
C) Bb / G / Bdim / C
D) Something else?
Would this work better in another key?
 

     1. chord symbols on paper are not nearly enough to specify the music well enough to make any useful decision
     2. even if we were working with sound, we're still in the situation of "writing chords" which, i find, tends to be a futile exercise 90% of the time -- the direction doesn't seem to take shape until some melodies, words, or other meaningful handles come into play
     3. assuming you did give me all of that, with sound, words, and melodies, and then asked me what comes next, then you would be asking me to enter into a co-writing partnership with you. which i might be willing to do but i'd first like to discuss the nature of the partnership a little before jumping into the project

2.24.24  1:24 pm   what is your opinion on general relativity?

      heavy

2.24.24  1:24 pm   Bill I want to learn a certain skill so so badly and I started taking lessons, but the lessons do the opposite of the creative play that feels natural for me. I'm struggling to do the simplest stuff the instructor tells us to do, it makes me feel like an idiot and leaves me wanting nothing less than to practice. How the heck do I save my soul in this trying situation?

      in this case, it seems obvious that you should quit this class
